issue.title: www.mercadopago.com.mx
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://www.mercadopago.com.mx](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mercadopago.com.mx)
### Comment
> * Domain: www.mercadopago.com.mx
> * Product: AdGuard DNS
> * Browser: Any (Android)
> * Error: Invalid TLS certificate / Possible MITM warning
> * Country: Mexico
> * Impact: Financial / payment platform
```
Username: @frank-bg
```

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/lobr0f5drls0kskcs804k8ogc8gc408e87g9l58a9s.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qfx0ybu9bggwggccokgoogw0gk4w0w418wdvd5tqfx.jpg?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `Linux; Android 16`
Browser: | Firefox Mobile
